mapper.sql: follow_id, customer_id, goods_id, create_time, modified_time, del_flag
mapper.delete: update np_customer_follow set del_flag='1',modified_time=now() where follow_id = #{atteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(DISTINCT goods_id) from np_customer_follow where del_flag='0'
and goods_id in (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info where goods_info_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchText}),'%'))
and goods_id = (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info where goods_info_item_no = #{searchText})
and goods_id=#{productId}

select count(goods_id) from np_customer_follow where del_flag='0'
and goods_id in (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info where goods_info_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchText}),'%'))
and goods_id = (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info where goods_info_item_no = #{searchText})
and goods_id=#{productId}

select a.*,(select customer_username from np_customer where customer_id=a.customer_id) as customer_username, (select info_email from np_customer_info where customer_id=a.customer_id) as info_email, (select info_mobile from np_customer_info where customer_id=a.customer_id) as info_mobile, (select goods_info_item_no from np_goods_info where goods_info_id=a.goods_id) as goods_info_item_no, (select goods_info_stock from np_goods_info where goods_info_id=a.customer_id) as goods_info_stock, (select goods_info_name from np_goods_info where goods_info_id=a.customer_id) as goods_info_name from np_customer_follow a where del_flag='0'
and goods_id in (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info where goods_info_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchText}),'%'))
and goods_id = (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info where goods_info_item_no = #{searchText})
limit #{startRowNum},#{endRowNum}

select a.*,(select customer_username from np_customer where customer_id=a.goods_id) as customer_username, (select info_email from np_customer_info where customer_id=a.goods_id) as info_email, (select info_mobile from np_customer_info where customer_id=a.goods_id) as info_mobile, (select goods_info_item_no from np_goods_info where goods_info_id=a.goods_id) as goods_info_item_no, (select goods_info_stock from np_goods_info where goods_info_id=a.goods_id) as goods_info_stock, (select goods_info_name from np_goods_info where goods_info_id=a.goods_id) as goods_info_name from np_customer_follow a where del_flag='0' and goods_id=#{productId}

select count(1) as atteCount,goods_id from np_customer_follow a where del_flag='0' and goods_id in (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info)
and goods_id in (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info where goods_info_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{searchText}),'%'))
and goods_id = (select goods_info_id from np_goods_info where goods_info_item_no = #{searchText})
group by goods_id order by atteCount desc limit #{startRowNum},#{endRowNum}
